formatted_address: Unit 1905, Block D, Impiana Nusajaya, Jalan Bendahara, East Ledang, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor, Malaysia
name: Marvelous Homestay Near Legoland

reviews.text: Beautiful house with a breath-taking view of Legoland Nusajaya. We had a wonderful overnight stay, we just wish we could stay longer. A very warm welcome with comfortable surrounding. It was easy to go shopping to Mydin supermarket and many choice of eating place at food court.

I have stayed here at Marvelous Homestay last October during my family holiday at Johor Bahru.

The place was very clean, comfy! And most importantly i’m in love with the view from the balcony! My kids love the spacious swimming pool and indoor playground.

There are also many channels to choose from the HyppTV channel and the Wifi is very fast. Will definitely come again!

Me and my family stayed here for several days and we were very pleased that it is relatively inexpensive, clean and well kept apartment. I enjoyed the clean, comfortable house with free high-speed internet (UniFi Advance Plan 30 Mbps), many channels to choose from the HyppTV selection. The homestay was great and it's conveniently located 7 minutes driving to Legoland.
Type a message...

It’s a very comfortable stay just likes at our own home with good location. The owner is very kind and helpful and provide lots of travel info before we check in. We strongly recommended to those who wants to stay near to Legoland.

It is near to Legoland (just 5 minutes driving). Also, place to eat is just walking distance (Bazar Mydin Anjung Nusajaya Food Court, Subway, 24 hours Muslim Indian restaurant is just walking distance 5 minutes)

vicinity: Unit 1905, Block D, Impiana Nusajaya, Jalan Bendahara, East Ledang, Iskandar Puteri
